name: Adventures of Quin85
description:
Welcome to the world of Clowns

You are a clown! (ingame) (meme)

Become a famous streamer and destroy games without breaking a sweat.
On your Adventure you will find allies that will lend you their strength.

Fight powerful Bosses and Enemies

Powerful base skills create an almost infinite Skill ceiling. This game will show you how good you actually are at Games. Your reaction speed and adaptability will be key to your success. Dash and bash through enemies to reset your jump and bash on.

Once you make it through a zone a powerful Boss is awaiting you. Starting easy they will gradually become harder and harder with every zone you leave behind you.





In Chapter 1 you will:


- Play through the beginnings of a scuffed Story

- Beat 10 very hard Zones with dangerous obstacles

- Fight 10 powerful Bosses

- Learn 7 unique abilities
